0.Pros: At this job you can learn how to boost up your multitasking skills...
0.Cons: There are good days and then there are bad days. If you have a bad day do yourself a favor and forget that you had a bad day because the next day might be worse. As a McDonald's employees, no matter the position, you are working in a faster paced environment, and you have to pick up with the speed. The moment you start to drag your feet, or slow down then you will be the reason why things aren't going the right way. You have to put your feelings aside, no matter what your boss says, or how bad your day is, and work like your at your best. This may become a challenge at first but you'll get the hang of it. You might not look at this as a con, you can look at this as advice, and that's a good thing. This advice can go for any job. Remember, you're not just working for your for your company, you're part of the company. Make your company look good!
